original_text: Abimelech and his group of soldiers ran to stand at the city gate. They stopped people going back into the city. The other two groups attacked the people in the fields and killed them.
korean_text: 아비멜렉과 그 떼는 돌격하여 성문 입구에 서고 두 무리는 밭에 있는 자들에게 돌격하여 그들을 죽이니

sentences.original_text: Abimelech and his group of soldiers ran
to stand at the city gate
They stopped people going back into the city
The other two groups attacked the people in the fields
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 두 그룹은 밭에 있는 사람들을 공격했다
